snippet: The grave problems raised by this lethal technology need to be addressed by the Obama administration, as a bipartisan panel has just made clear.
abstract: Editorial calls on Obama administration to address issues of targeted drone attacks on suspected terrorists, which can cause unintended civilian deaths; agrees with warnings that United States' continued use of drones to carry out secretive killings could have serious negative repercussions, including growth of terrorist organizations; calls for more transparency and creation of independent commission to review drone policy.
lead_paragraph: The grave problems raised by this lethal technology need to be addressed by the Obama administration, as a bipartisan panel has just made clear.
